name: Don't Let Dan Die
description:
Don't let Dan Die is our submission to the GMTK 2020 Game Jam.

Dan charges ahead with no worry about his own danger, you must prevent Dan from falling to his own demise. Be careful though, your power to manipulate manipulates everything. Don't lose track of your controls and guide Dan to the sweet riches.
